page.title: 11Farming. 1
page.content: {Comparison of three typical farms in {our area. { {Q.}How big are the farms? {A.}Farm (a) 920 acres (large). Farm (b) 321 acres (medium). Farm (c) 200 acres (small). {Q.}What kind of farming do they do? {A.}Farm (a) mixed farming. Farm (b) arable and cattle. Farm (c) arable and sheep. {Q.}What is grown? {A.}Wheat.Barley.Grass for hay and silage. Peas. Oil Seed Rape (New crops). {Q.}Where are the crops sold? {A.}WHEAT sold to local grain merchants,who are the agents for:- Rank Hovis McDougal.Spillers'Flour Mills.Marshall's Chunk Chickens. BARLEY sold to Simpson (Maltsters), Berwick.For home and export.
